mod.name: Bundle Of Bundles
mod.description: Contains all of the config options and compatibility support for bundles.

relics.name: Pho
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 3 Max HP.
At the start of your turn, gain 1 bundlecore:Fire_Breathing.
relics.flavorText: A very spicy and meaty eat that is great for getting over bumps and bruises.

relics.name: Mana Cloak
relics.description:
When you use a potion, gain [E].
If you have a potion and take unblocked attack damage, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies and apply 1 Weak to them.
relics.flavorText: A refreshing cloak that can help extract the hidden potential of your draughts.

relics.name: Ancient Meteorite
relics.description:
Upon pickup, raise your maximum hand size by 1.
At the start of your turn, lose [E] and draw cards until your hand is full.
relics.flavorText: Food for a giant green dragon, not for you!

relics.name: Cheese Board
relics.description:
Upon pickup gain 1 Potion Slot.
All hallway fights now give a bonus potion reward, even special rarity ones.
Potions are 40% stronger, with their potency increasing by at least 1.
Potions grant 1 Max HP on use.
relics.flavorText: Includes a wine glass to put a potion in! The meal complements your potions perfectly.

relics.name: Curse of the Peglin King
relics.description:
bundlecore:Rare.
Upon pickup, gain 1 Potion Slot.
At the start of your turn, add a Miracle to the top of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Half of the time you feel full of energy, half of the time you feel slow. This odd artifact also has a slot in the back for a night cap.

relics.name: Defresh Potion
relics.description:
bundlecore:Rare
Upon pickup, raise your maximum hand size by 1.
At the start of your turn, gain [E][E] and draw 2 cards.
ALL CARDS EXHAUST.
relics.flavorText: As you drink from the potion you feel your memory begin to fade... It never returns...

relics.name: Magma Skull
relics.description:
bundlecore:Rare.
Upon pickup, gain 2 potion slots.
When you use a potion that isn't a bundlecore:Lava_Potion, gain a Lava Potion.
Elite fights drop two extra potions.
relics.flavorText: Overflowing with real lava, try putting it in those empty potion bottles!

relics.name: Pumpkin Pie
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 6 Max HP and raise your maximum hand size by 2.
At the start of combat, gain [E][E][E] and draw 5 cards.
relics.flavorText: It tastes so great, but can only fill you up for a disappointingly short period of time.

relics.name: Red Royal Gel
relics.description: At the start of combat, Channel 3 bundlecore:Slimes.
relics.flavorText: The collective congealment of two slime kings, this potent gel crown will keep slimes in check.

relics.name: Prime Rod of Ice
relics.description: The first time each combat you play a non Power card that costs 3 or more, apply 1 bundlecore:Slow to ALL enemies and yourself.
relics.flavorText: Enhanced with a better stave from haglin, this frosty wand will make your enemies chill out!

potions.name: Lava Potion
potions.description: Deal 25 Damage and apply 5 On Fire to the target.

keywords.name: Fire Breathing
keywords.description: When you draw a Status or Curse card, deals damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Lava Potion
keywords.description: Potion: Deal 25 damage to the target and apply 5 On Fire.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces and be entirely lowercase. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: On Fire
keywords.description: At the start of this creatures turn, On Fire is increased by 1 then it will lose HP. Damage is doubled if the target is Vulnerable.

keywords.name: Rare
keywords.description: Spawns less often than other Relics of its type.

keywords.name: Slime
keywords.description:
Passive: At the end of your turn deal damage to a random enemy (Base: 1).
Orb damage affected by Strength, Dexterity and Focus.
Evoke: Gain 1 Orb slot and Channel this Orb.

keywords.name: Slow
keywords.description: Target takes 10% more damage for each stack additively, resets to 0 each turn and increases by 1 when a card is played.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Note, spaces are not allowed in NAMES. Also, they should be entirely lowercase. For multi-word keywords, see the next one.
